customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: An obviously trapped weapon rack. Dredmor has a sick sense of humor.

customblocker.name: Rubble
customblocker.description: A portion of the ceiling and walls have collapsed, making passage virtually impossible.

customblocker.name: Blockage
customblocker.description: Large chunks of stone completely occlude the hallway.

customblocker.name: Rubble
customblocker.description: A portion of the ceiling and walls have collapsed, making passage virtually impossible.

customblocker.name: Blockage
customblocker.description: Large blocks of stone blocks completely block the blocked hallway. Blockity block block. Somebody should buy a blocking thesaurus.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the dank dungeon breeze.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The stench of seafood chokes the candle flame.

pedestal.name: Warning
pedestal.text: This is a test of the Emergency Dungeon Warning System. This is only a test. Had this been a real emergency, you would be dead now.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: It's a little nest.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: It's a little nest.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: It's a little nest.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

action.text: There are conspicuously zero underpants in this closet! Those gnomes you saw in the hallway must have taken them.

customblocker.name: Loculus
customblocker.description: Here lies Borg, son of Picard.

customblocker.name: Grave of Red
customblocker.description: Here lies Red. He died that others, more important than himself, might live.

customblocker.name: Grave of Kirok
customblocker.description: Behold the god who bleeds. He bled his last.

customblocker.name: Grave of Juan
customblocker.description: The needs of the many, outweigh the needs of the few. Or the Juan.

customblocker.name: Jim
customblocker.description: He's a dead Jim.

customblocker.name: Bits of the Dead
customblocker.description: The bones have been gnawed on repeatedly over the years.

customblocker.name: Loculus
customblocker.description: You can hear rats scurrying in the hollows behind this wall.

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: A body in a communal catacomb.

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: A dessicated body shoved into a notch in the wall.

customblocker.name: Cheaply Buried
customblocker.description: His friends and family saved money on the coffin by stuffing his remains in an old shoe box.

customblocker.name: Loculus
customblocker.description: This one remains unopened and undisturbed. Let's leave it that way.

customblocker.name: Bits of the Dead
customblocker.description: The bones have been gnawed on repeatedly over the years.

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: Died with his boots on. Let's hope nobody takes them.

customblocker.name: Smelly Grave
customblocker.description: This body smells particularly dreadful, even for a corpse. Don't ask why.

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: There are still pennies on his eyes.

customblocker.name: Infested Dead
customblocker.description: A centipede scurries amongst the bones.

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: The mummified remains of some long-dead and long-forgotten individual.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the Zombie Zoo.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the Zombie Zoo.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the Zombie Zoo.

customblocker.description: The iron bars of the Zombie Zoo.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the Zombie Zoo.

customblocker.name: Dredmor Auxilliary Zombie Zoo
customblocker.description: We hope you enjoy the exhibits. Please pull the lever for a feeding demonstration.

customblocker.name: Iron Bars
customblocker.description: Stout iron bars.

customblocker.name: Grave of Benenato
customblocker.description: Here lies the dandy rogue Benenato, who was buried along with his wardrobe, for the good of humanity.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Closet Bar
customblocker.description: A bar for hanging articles of clothing.

customblocker.name: Keypad
customblocker.description: The sign next to these buttons suggests they are supposedly somehow capable of locking the air. It's either magic or nonsense.

customblocker.name: Robotic Claw
customblocker.description: The coppery appendage of a thing from beyond the mortal realm. Thankfully, it's programmed to sort and assemble, not 'kill all humans'.

customblocker.name: Robotic Hand
customblocker.description: A mechanical arm, for some sort of construction task. Seems harmless, but a little creepy.

customblocker.name: Mechanical Greeter
customblocker.description: A friendly-enough chap, it seems to want to shake hands. Nametag identifies it as 'Waldo.'

customblocker.name: Enormous Auto-Wrench
customblocker.description: Oh, the bolts you could turn with a wrench like this! Sadly, not the bolts that attach it to the floor.

customblocker.name: Agar Aguardpost
customblocker.description: 'Dredmor commands you to aguard this wall with your gelatinous lives. Let nothing penetrate its slimy surfaces.'

customblocker.name: Allergen Warning
customblocker.description: 'WARNING: Wall produced in a facility that also processes shellfish, peanuts, diggle eggs, and small puppies.'

customblocker.name: Rocky Alien Terrain
customblocker.description: This rock formation kinda looks like it's made out of styrofoam.

action.text: One to beam up! ...Just be thankful this wasn't a time-travel episode. You don't want to even see the Nazi Diggles.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: You've found the ancestral breeding grounds of the diggles. Eww.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: A little nest on a little island.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: A little nest.

customblocker.name: Skeleton
customblocker.description: The last guy who tried to cross this bridge. He thought it was only a flesh wound.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: Who said anything about 'fair'? It wasn't me.

customblocker.name: Sewer Grate
customblocker.description: Sometimes known as a Dwarven Educational Grate, because they fill their sewers and schools with the same things.

customblocker.name: Sewer Grate
customblocker.description: Sometimes known as a Dwarven Educational Grate, because they fill their sewers and schools with the same things.

customblocker.name: Sewer Grate
customblocker.description: Sometimes known as a Dwarven Educational Grate, because they fill their sewers and schools with the same things.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Still
customblocker.description: A still for swill. You've found the secret moonshine operation that funds Dredmor's armies.

customblocker.name: Vegi Day Care
customblocker.description: Dredmor may be evil, but at least he doesn't skimp on employee benefits.

customblocker.name: Reading Nook
customblocker.description: The shelf is dotted with trashy novels, and circular coffee stains. This is clearly some monsters favorite reading spot.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the starboard bow.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the port bow. Don't tell me you thought this ship was a library.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Dusty Bookcase
customblocker.description: On this shelf are half a dozen signed copies of 'Everything I Ever Needed To Know I Learned From Dredmor.'

customblocker.name: Dusty Bookcase
customblocker.description: One book catches your attention: 'Eyebrows On The Grassy Knoll'. Apparently, the monsters have a few conspiracy theories about you.

customblocker.name: Mysterious Glass Square
customblocker.description: This screen is how the Diggles spy on the rest of this floor. Thankfully, there's no thrusties on this floor.

customblocker.name: Flickering Glass Square
customblocker.description: Staring at this thing makes your head hurt.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines. It doesn't look too bright.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines. It doesn't look too bright.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines. It doesn't look too bright.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines. It doesn't look too bright.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines. It doesn't look too bright.

customblocker.name: Commando Schedule
customblocker.description: This place is the headquarters and nerve center that coordinates all Diggle activity on this floor.

customblocker.name: Propaganda Poster
customblocker.description: 'When you walk with Dredmor, you walk with Victory. May his black geometry guide us! This message approved by Lord Dredmor.'

customblocker.name: Emergency Procedures
customblocker.description: In case of emergency, open chest.

customengraving.description: A cupboard for holding sundry kitchen staples.

customblocker.name: Countertop
customblocker.description: A window into the kitchen so you can smell what's cookin'.

customblocker.name: Dusty Bookcase
customblocker.description: There's a well-used copy on this shelf of 'To Serve Man', in the original language. If only you had time to translate.

customblocker.name: Countertop
customblocker.description: A window into the kitchen so you can smell what's cookin'.

pedestal.name: Secret Listening Post
pedestal.text: Secret Diggle Listening Post. Those creepy Commando Diggles spend hours here, quietly listening at the walls. There could be one silently spying on you now.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A sturdy rack for holding weaponry.

customblocker.name: Sewer Grate
customblocker.description: Sometimes known as a Dwarven Educational Grate, because they fill their sewers and schools with the same things.

customblocker.name: Sewer Grate

customblocker.name: Dwarven Still
customblocker.description: A still for swill. You've found the secret moonshine operation that funds Dredmor's armies.

action.text: Swarmies! You'd heard rumors they liked to swarm. Apparently, the rumors are actually true!

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker judgmentally at you.

action.text: Wow! A fuzzy monster just grew out of that fecund patch of foetid dirt right in freaking front of you. Isn't the circle of life fabulous?

customblocker.name: Amateur Butchery Project
customblocker.description: Just another side of beef.

customblocker.name: Fishy Sconce
customblocker.description: The fishy little flame beats with the steady rhythm of the waves.

customblocker.name: Fishy Sconce
customblocker.description: The fishy little flame beats with the steady rhythm of the waves.

customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: These candles have flickered their last in this soggy domain.

customblocker.description: The wood is stained and bleached by years of repeated exposure to harmful substances.

customblocker.name: Robotic Claw
customblocker.description: The coppery appendage of a thing from beyond the mortal realm. Thankfully, it's programmed to sort and assemble, not 'kill all humans'.

customblocker.name: Robotic Hand
customblocker.description: A mechanical arm, for some sort of construction task. Seems harmless, but a little creepy.

customblocker.name: Mechanical Greeter
customblocker.description: A friendly-enough chap, it seems to want to shake hands. Nametag identifies it as 'Waldo.'

customblocker.name: Enormous Auto-Wrench
customblocker.description: Oh, the bolts you could turn with a wrench like this! Sadly, not the bolts that attach it to the floor.

customblocker.name: Summoning Circle
customblocker.description: Some sort of summoner's circle, drawn on the floor in flourescent fingernail polish.

customblocker.name: Summoning Circle
customblocker.description: A thin layer of frost has formed over these arcane symbols. Standing near them makes you shiver.

customblocker.name: Summoning Circle
customblocker.description: These magical glyphs appear to be drawn in edible body paint. From the scent, you'd guess it's Black Cherry flavor.

customblocker.name: Summoning Circle
customblocker.description: Is this really a mystical summoning glyph, or just a disgusting old wad of cinnamon-flavored chewing gum?

action.text: Some foul magick has summoned a mixed horde of hideous demons from the nether realms!

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker aloofly at you.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames billow and roll in their little nook.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: An obviously trapped weapon rack. Dredmor has a sick sense of humor.

customblocker.name: Practice Target
customblocker.description: Whoever used this last wasn't a very good shot.

customblocker.name: Practice Target
customblocker.description: Looks familiar somehow.

pedestal.name: Registration Book
pedestal.text: It clearly indicates that the Archdigglery Range is for members only. It even says 'No Eyebrows Need Apply.'

customblocker.name: Diggle Nest
customblocker.description: The ceiling above this nest is mirrored.

customblocker.name: Dining Table
customblocker.description: This is the shortest table you've ever seen. Only etiquette prevents you from walking over right over it.

customblocker.name: Cursed Springs
customblocker.description: The inscription relates a 'very tragic tale of young diggle who drown here 1000 year ago.'

action.text: Oh, no! You've fallen into the cursed springs of Jusenkyo, and been transformed by their magic.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the starboard side of the big coppery airship this level must surely be.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the port bow of whatever the heck we're in.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Neglected Anvil
customblocker.description: This Anvil of Krong has been shamefully run out of juice.

action.text: Praises to the faithful adventurer, you have turned on the generator! Krong may reward you! Or not.

customblocker.name: Furnace
customblocker.description: The furnace was recently used, and is still quite warm.

customblocker.name: Smelter, Mold-form
customblocker.description: A well-used smelter mold.

customblocker.name: Smelter, Furnace
customblocker.description: A well-used smelter furnace.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden weapon rack.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames flicker fickly at you.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames flicker fickly at you.

loot.subtype: The Hexaxe of the Magic Axe Lords

customengraving.name: Pig Bones
customengraving.description: The remains of a throttled truffle-hunting pig.

customblocker.name: Apple Tree
customblocker.description: As befits a tree with such low-hanging fruit, they've all been picked. Just a few bad apples remain on the ground.

loot.subtype: Savvarius, Greatsword of the Amusin Clan

customblocker.description: The ceiling above this nest is mirrored.

customblocker.description: A long table so Dredmor can sit very far from his guests.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Rusty old bars.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Stout iron bars.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Rusty old bars.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Stout iron bars, caked in blood.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Stout iron bars.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: The thought of languishing in Dredmor's penal system makes you feel sick.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Scratches on the framework reveal that someone tried really hard to break out of this cell.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Rusty old bars.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: It says 'Fish in a (very long and narrow) barrel.'

customblocker.name: Rubble
customblocker.description: A portion of the ceiling and walls have collapsed, making passage virtually impossible.

customblocker.name: Blockage
customblocker.description: Large chunks of stone completely occlude the hallway.

customblocker.name: Wandering Monster Table
customblocker.description: Here's where monsters play poker or roll dice between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons.

customblocker.name: Monster Computer
customblocker.description: Even monsters like to surf the internet (between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons). The computer is their friend.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: The monsters are still learning how to use weapons.

customblocker.name: Wandering Monster Table
customblocker.description: Here's where monsters play poker or roll dice between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons.

customblocker.name: Monster Computer
customblocker.description: Even monsters like to surf the internet (between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons). The computer is their friend.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: Not that you've ever seen a monster use a weapon.

customblocker.name: Wandering Monster Table
customblocker.description: Here's where monsters play poker or roll dice between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons.

customblocker.name: Monster Computer
customblocker.description: Even monsters like to surf the internet (between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons). The computer is their friend.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: That monster almost thought of picking up a weapon here.

customblocker.name: Wandering Monster Table
customblocker.description: Here's where monsters play poker or roll dice between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons.

customblocker.name: Monster Computer
customblocker.description: Even monsters like to surf the internet (between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons). The computer is their friend.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: One of these days, a monster will pick up a weapon, and then you'll be sorry.

customblocker.name: Stockroom Notices
customblocker.description: Stock-room is for the use of employees and clever customers, only. You break it, you bought it.
